basics.name: Ali Soltani
basics.label: DevOps Engineer
basics.summary: Skilled DevOps Engineer with 5+ years of hands-on experience  supporting, automating, and optimizing mission critical deployments in  production with linux and container and VMs, leveraging configuration management, CI/CD, and DevOps processes.

work.summary: MASHAD WASHER CO. is located in Mashhad, Iran. Company is working in Hardware Stores business activities.

Farab (Private Joint Stock), as a skilled and responsible general contractor, has tried to move toward excellence since 1992. Having successfully completing more than 30 projects, Farab is currently working on different domestic and international projects in a wide variety of fields such as hydro power plants, thermal power plants, oil, gas, petrochemical projects, railway industries, civil works, smart grid, water treatment plants, water desalination plants, and operation and maintenance of power plants.
highlights: Network Administration and site to site tunnel

work.summary: Our story began with a small group of tech-enthusiasts and software developers, willing to make a dramatic impact on financial industry. We joined each other and soon our small group grew in size and scale. As a young, dynamic and also creative community, we know no boundaries to develop and expand technology. Our thirst for learning and education will never be quenched. Not only do we recruit skilled software developers and financial professionals, but also we provide the potential talents with perfect opportunity to flourish.
